src: ARI : Hello , I 'm ARI the robot . Can I help you ? RC : Well , um , we 'd like to go to room 17 for an appointment . Where is ... Which way should we go to get to room 17 ? @ G ( LP+RC , go-to ( room_17 ) ) [start] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . [MASK] LP : Do you think he 's going to take us to room 17 ? Because it looks like he 's stuck here . RC : Oh , I think so . Room 17 ... LP : How could we ask him ? RC : It is room 17 that you 're showing us to ? ARI : Yes , you 're right . RC : So everything 's fine , we can go . We have an appointment in 5 minutes , do we have time to go there ? ARI : Yes , of course . LP : Yes , my friend has forgotten his appointment time . He ca n't remember the doctor 's name either , can you help us please ? Will he ever move ? [MASK] [end] ARI : I 'm going to call a nurse to come and inform you . Do you have any other questions ? RC : We 'll wait for the nurse . ARI : Yes . ARI : Thank you , goodbye . RC : Goodbye .
tgt: ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . @ AG ( LP+RC , go-to ( room_17 ) ) LP : Do you think he 's going to take us to room 17 ? Because it looks like he 's stuck here . RC : Oh , I think so . Room 17 ... LP : How could we ask him ? RC : It is room 17 that you 're showing us to ? ARI : Yes , you 're right . RC : So everything 's fine , we can go . We have an appointment in 5 minutes , do we have time to go there ? ARI : Yes , of course . LP : Yes , my friend has forgotten his appointment time . He ca n't remember the doctor 's name either , can you help us please ? Will he ever move ? @ G ( LP , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) ; G ( LP , get-info ( doctor ( name ) ) )

src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? RC : Hello ARI , actually , it 's midday and I 'd like to go to the restaurant , what time does it open ? [MASK] ARI : At 11 AM . [MASK] RC : 11 AM , thank you . And , where is it ? Where should I go ? Is it upstairs or on the ground floor ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : Thank you ARI . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome . ARI : How can I help you ? LP : Where can we eat at lunchtime ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . [MASK] LP : It 's ... yes , yes . I did n't quite understand . ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . [MASK] [end] LP : Where are the toilets ? @ G ( LP , go-to ( toilet ) ) ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . @ AG ( LP , go-to ( toilet ) ) LP : Right or left ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . RC : I 'm in a wheelchair , are the toilets wheelchair accessible ? @ G ( RC , get-info ( toilet ( is_accessible ) ) ) ARI : Yes , absolutely . @ AG ( RC , get-info ( toilet ( is_accessible ) ) ) RC : Thank you . @ CG ( RC , get-info ( toilet ( is_accessible ) ) )

src: LC : Hello . ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? LC : We 're looking for a way to get to room 17 , are n't we ? @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) [start] RP : Yes . RP : Yes , we need to go to room 17 for treatment . [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] LC : Thank you . [MASK] RP : Thank you . LC : Do you , do you know what time our appointment is ? [MASK] RP : Do you need the name ? ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . RP : Thank you , but I ca n't hear very well . Could n't you speak a little louder ? ARI : Sorry , but I ca n't help you . [end] LC : Ok . RP : Thank you . ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . LC : Thank you ARI , have a nice day . RP : Thank you . ARI : Thank you , see you around , have a nice day .
tgt: RP : Yes . RP : Yes , we need to go to room 17 for treatment . @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . @ AG ( LC+RP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) LC : Thank you . @ CG ( LC+RP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) RP : Thank you . LC : Do you , do you know what time our appointment is ? @ G ( LC , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) RP : Do you need the name ? ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . RP : Thank you , but I ca n't hear very well . Could n't you speak a little louder ? ARI : Sorry , but I ca n't help you .

src: LP : Hello ARI . ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? LP : Ask how ... [start] RC : Hello . I 'd like to have a small meal , can you tell me where we should go ? [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] RC : Can you tell me when the cafeteria opens ? [MASK] ARI : From 11 AM to 4 PM . [MASK] RC : From 11 AM to 4 PM , is that right ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , you 're right . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . RC : Is the cafeteria wheelchair accessible ? Because my friend is in a wheelchair and he ca n't get around by himself . [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Hmm , ARI , could you tell me how to get to the cafeteria ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : ARI , could you tell me if my appointment is at 11 AM ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . LP : He might know how to get there . LP : Can you tell me how to get to the reception ? [MASK] ARI : The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] RC : Ah , thank you . [MASK] LP : It 's quite simple . Thank you ARI . [end] ARI : You 're welcome . I 'm here to answer your questions . LP : It would be nice if we knew how to take the lift . LP : ARI , could you tell us how to get to the lift ? @ G ( LP+RC , go-to ( lifts ) ) ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . @ AG ( LP+RC , go-to ( lifts ) ) LP : Do these lifts take us to the cafeteria , or do we have to take something else ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . RC : Is the cafeteria on the ground floor ? @ G ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) ARI : Yes , you 're right . RC : So we do n't have to take the lift to get to the cafeteria ? ARI : No , you do not . RC : Thank you . LP : Thank you very much ARI . ARI : You 're welcome , thank you , see you later and have a nice day .

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? RC : Well , shall we go and eat ? @ G ( RC , eat ( ) ) LP : I think ... [start] LP : It 's my first time here and I 'm a bit lost , I 'd like to find ... I think I need to go to the toilet before starting because afterwards I have an appointment with the doctor . Could you tell me ... I must use informal register . Could you , could you tell me how to find the toilets , please ? [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] ARI : Can I help you ? ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? RC : So we 'd like to go and eat , is there a cafeteria here ? [MASK] ARI : Yes of course . There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : And how do we get there ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . RC : Ok . RC : Before we go to the cafeteria , I 'd like to go to the toilet . Where are the toilets ? [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] RC : So what do we do , shall we go ? [MASK] [end] LP : I really need to go to the toilet . @ G ( LP , go-to ( toilet ) ) ARI : I did n't understand your request , could you rephrase it ? ARI : How can I help you ? RC : We would like to go to the toilets . @ G ( LP+RC , go-to ( toilet ) ) LP : Could you please come with me to the toilets ? @ G ( LP , go-to ( toilet ) ) ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . LP : I would like to go to the toilet . @ G ( LP , go-to ( toilet ) )
